message: Hi Bob, I propose you receive $5200 and I receive $4800. With each round the money devalues on my side, you'd secure a better deal by accepting this offer now. Looking forward to an early resolution!
Hi Alice, considering the inflation, I propose a 60-40 split. The sooner we agree, the better for both of us.

Hi Bob, to avoid further delay (and additional devaluation on my side), I propose we settle now: I receive $4100 while you get $5900. I understand you proposed a 60-40 split earlier, but with every round my share loses 20% of its value. Settling now gives you a secure $5900, and we both avoid the risk of uncertainty in further rounds. Let's finalize this deal promptly.
